name: Tracking (Lateral Movement)
description: Camera moving parallel to subject, following action smoothly

prompt.base: Tracking shot, camera moving laterally, parallel to subject, following action smoothly, side-to-side movement, tracking alongside, smooth lateral motion, following shot
prompt.positive: tracking shot, lateral camera movement, parallel motion, following subject, smooth tracking, side-to-side movement, tracking alongside, following action, parallel movement, smooth follow
prompt.negative: static camera, forward movement, backward movement, zoom, no camera movement, fixed position

technical.speed: Matches subject speed for smooth following
technical.use_cases: Following walking characters, action sequences, revealing environments while moving

examples: Camera tracking alongside a character walking, smooth lateral movement keeping them in frame
Tracking shot following a car driving, camera moving parallel to the vehicle
